column2: A Comparative Evaluation of GenAI-Assisted Tactile Graphics from the Perspective of Totally Blind Professionals in Tactile Graphic Supervision
column3: Kengo Tanaka; Ayaka Tsutsui; Yoichi Ochiai
column4: ASSETS '25: The 27th International ACM SIGACCESS Conference on Computers and Accessibility
column10: Evaluates GenAI-assisted tactile graphics for picture books; highlights human-in-loop refinement.

column2: TexSenseGAN: A User-Guided System for Optimizing Texture-Related Vibrotactile Feedback Using GAN
column3: Zhang, Mingxin; Terui, Shun; Makino, Yasutoshi; Shinoda, Hiroyuki
column10: User-guided GAN for optimizing texture-related vibrotactile feedback; no BLV-specific validation reported.

column2: TactileNet: Bridging the Accessibility Gap with AI-Generated Tactile Graphics for Individuals with Vision Impairment
column3: Khan, Adnan; Choubineh, Alireza; Shaaban, Mai A.; Akkasi, Abbas; Komeili, Majid
column10: Stable Diffusion–based framework using LoRA and DreamBooth to generate embossing-ready tactile graphics with high structural fidelity.

column2: Text-Guided Image-to-Image Translation for Converting RGB Maps to Tactile Images
column10: Text-guided image-to-image translation generates tactile maps from RGB inputs; builds dataset of 9.8k triplets.

column2: AI-generated tactile graphics for visually impaired children: A usability study of a multimodal educational product
column3: Wu, Hantian; Yang, Hongyi; Chang, Fangyuan; Zhu, Dian; Liu, Zhao
column10: Multimodal LLM and DALL·E-based tool generating tactile graphics and audio for blind children; evaluated with 19 users.

column2: A Step Towards Automated and Generalizable Tactile Map Generation Using Generative Adversarial Networks
column10: Introduces tactile map dataset of 6.5k Google Maps samples and GANs for automatic map element extraction and inpainting.

column2: AltCanvas: A Tile-Based Image Editor with Generative AI for Blind or Visually Impaired People
column3: Lee, Seonghee; Kohga, Maho; Landau, Steve; O'Modhrain, Sile; Subramonyam, Hari
column4: ACM ASSETS 2024: The 26th International ACM SIGACCESS Conference on Computers and Accessibility
column10: Tile-based editor allowing blind users to create and edit visual scenes via generative AI with audio feedback.

column2: Artificial Intelligence-Driven Text-to-Tactile Graphics Generation for Visual Impaired People
column3: Dzhurynskyi, Yehor; Mayik, Volodymyr; Mayik, Lyudmyla
column10: Transformer-based text-to-tactile synthesis for educational accessibility.

column2: Text to haptics: method and case studies of designing tactile graphics for inclusive tactile picture books by digital fabrication and generative AI
column3: Tanaka, Kengo; Fushimi, Tatsuki; Tsutsui, Ayaka; Ochiai, Yoichi
column10: Diffusion-based tactile picture book overlays integrating generative AI and 3D printing.

column2: Visual-Tactile Cross-Modal Data Generation Using Residue-Fusion GAN with Feature-Matching and Perceptual Losses
column3: Cai, Shaoyu; Zhu, Kening; Ban, Yuki; Narumi, Takuji
column10: GAN-based cross-modal synthesis between visual textures and vibrotactile feedback.

column2: Generating Vibrotactile Patterns from Texture Images Using Conditional GANs
column4: International Conference on Human Haptic Sensing and Touch Enabled Computer Applications (EuroHaptics)
column10: Early conditional GAN generating vibrotactile signals from texture images or attributes.
